name: No Parachute
description:
No Parachute is a fast-paced arcade game with a pixel art style, in which you will dodge various obstacles in free fall. The man jumped out of a plane, and his parachute didn’t open. But instead of crashing, he fell into a mysterious hole in the ground. He’ll have to fly through a lot of mines and tunnels and meet unexpected visitors.
As the game progresses, the unsuccessful skydiver will have to use all his skill and reaction to survive. You will have very little time to assess the situation and make the right decisions, so be prepared to engage your entire concentration. Try to catch Zen (without burning your ass)!

Key Features

  • A variety of hardcore levels in different styles
  • The way you fly through levels affects your score. Playing slowly won't get you a high result
  • Only one life at every level
  • You could lose your limbs

Try to find out what is on the other side of the tunnel, and save your arms and legs along the way!
